title: I can't log in lol
body: Got back trying to play some lol but, when i try to log in after i put my username and password it said "Connection Error". Help please or you just updating the game.

replies.body:
It sounds like there are conflicts with your connection reaching our servers. This can be caused by a number of issues, but the first we will check is your local network configuration. Work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common settings that can potentially conflict with League.

Let me know if this helped you out.
I was able to log in but i didn't get my S6 reward i got place in Gold V and i played 18 games but i didn't get my reward yet :(.
We're still working on getting those out. Sit tight and you'll have those rewards added to your account soon, bud. ^.^
